item.title: August Bookings Discounted
item.description:
We’re now offering 20% off bookings for events taking place in August.

All proceeds from The Orange Rooms are invested in Voluntary Action LeicesterShire’s work supporting the local community, so when you book a room, you’ll also help change lives.

With our 20% discount, room bookings in August start from £64. The price of booking includes IT equipment as standard and all of our rooms are fully accessible.

In addition, our on-site catering and dedicated staff will also be on hand throughout the day to ensure that your event runs smoothly.
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: 10% Off your First Orange Rooms Booking
item.description:
We’re pleased to announce that new customers will now received a 10% discount on Orange Rooms bookings.

Our rooms are flexible, fully accessible and come equipped with IT equipment as standard.

In addition, because all proceeds from The Orange Rooms are invested in our work supporting the local community, when you book a room you’ll also help local VCS Groups change lives.

Our on-site catering and dedicated staff will be on hand throughout the day to ensure that your event runs smoothly.
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: Booking Orange Rooms makes a difference
item.description:
Booking your meetings, conferences or events at Orange Rooms can make a difference to people lives.

It helps to fund Voluntary Action Leicestershire, who provides advice, guidance and information to the thousands of voluntary organisations throughout Leicester & Leicestershire.

VALUES supports people with learning disabilities and are one of the groups that benefits from proceeds made by Orange Rooms.
item.dc:creator: editor
